modName: CN - Xena The Warrior Princess Companions (WIP)
summary: Grab three different characters from the popular show Xena: The Warrior Princess. You can get Xena, Gabrielle and Callisto. They are all standalone and use the CBBE body!
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][color=#ffffff][color=#b6d7a8][size=6]IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN CONTINUING THIS PROJECT, PLEASE CONTACT ME @ [/size][size=6]chalknymph@outlook.com[/size][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=6]
[/size][/color][/font]

(OLD INFORMATION FOR CURRENTLY UPLOADED FILES)
What you will need:[/color][/color][/size]
Latest Updates for Skyrim
Dragonborn
Dawnguard[color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]
[color=#ea9999][size=3]I will not be supporting Vanilla versions and please do not ask for such.[/size][/color]

Grab three different characters from the popular show Xena: The Warrior Princess. You can get Xena, Gabrielle and Callisto. They are all standalone and use the CBBE body![color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]These followers was inspired by the characters and this is my take of them[color=#93c47d]. [color=#ffffff]They are all [/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#d5a6bd][color=#ffffff]skilled characters (Gabrielle though, starts at a lower level and will auto-level with you) and these settings are tweaked to resemble that, and of course if you feel that is too much you are welcome to tweak them to your tastes. They are ALL essential and marriageable, so you don't have to worry about them getting killed by anything on your journeys - or to your wedding (hey, it's Riften, anything CAN happen).
[/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]
[font=Georgia][i][size=3]Xena[/size] [/i][/font][/color][/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]wants to make amends for who she was in the past; for the wrongs she has committed as a warlord. She became the Warrior Princess, the "Destroyer of Nations".Â  She is in Skyrim to do good. She is a tall Imperial and [color=#d5a6bd]she is at level 65[/color], and will not auto-level. She wears custom armor. To see the list of her perks, abilities and Weapon stats[url=http://chalknymph.wordpress.com/2014/10/07/character-abilities-and-perks-xena/] click this[/url].[/color][/size][/color] [color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]She can be found at [color=#c27ba0]Frost Fruit Inn[/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color].

[color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff][font=Georgia][i][size=3]Gabrielle [/size][/i][/font][/color][/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]was about to become a slave, along with many other women from Potidaea, had not Xena interfered. She became Xena's ally, and best friend as the two traveled across the land, helping others and doing good deeds. She followed the Warrior Princess to Skyrim. She is an Imperial and is at level 1, and will auto-level with the character. She wears vanilla armor. [color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff] To see the list of her perks, abilities and Weapon stats[url=http://chalknymph.wordpress.com/2014/10/07/character-abilities-and-perks-gabrielle/] click this[/url].[/color][/size][/color] She can be found at [color=#c27ba0]Frost Fruit Inn[/color].
[/color][/size][/color]
[color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff][i][font=Georgia][size=3]Callisto[/size][/font] [/i]was created by Xena. As a child, Xena's army had laid waste to the place she had called home. It was the last time she ever saw her friends and family. Her burning hatred for Xena made her kill in her name. Hera had granted her immortality to take down Hercules but since coming to Skyrim, to track Xena and Gabrielle down. She is a Nord and[color=#b6d7a8] is at level 50[/color], and will not auto-level. She wears vanilla armor. To see the list of her perks, abilities and Weapon Stats [url=http://chalknymph.wordpress.com/2014/10/07/character-abilities-and-perks-callisto/]click this[/url]. [/color][/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff]She can be found at [color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#ffffff][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#d5a6bd][color=#ffffff][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#d5a6bd][color=#ffffff][color=#ffd966][color=#c27ba0]Dawnguard Castle, in the Grounds[/color][color=#ffffff].[/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color]

The file has been packed as a BSA and it has been checked with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] and cleaned.[size=2]

[color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][b][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]They don't look like the actors! FIX IT NOW!!!![/color][/color][/b][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]I am no expert when it comes to face creation with utilities so if you would like a different appearance, I suggest you make the edits yourself. You cannot upload them as it contains a combination of work that I have sought permission to use an was free to use.[/color][/color][/color][/color][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][color=#ffffff]
[/color][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]
[b][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]I hate their looks!!!!!![/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/b][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]Read the Q and A above, it will have your answer to this. [/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][color=#ffffff]

[/color][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][b][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]They are not lore-friendly![/color][/color][/b][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]Because of their appearance? Let me introduce you to the [url=http://www.creationkit.com/]Creation Kit[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?]NPC Editor[/url].
Because of their stats? Here is a quote from the top of this page "[color=#ffe599][i]...[size=2][size=2]these settings are tweaked to resemble that, and of course if you feel that is too much you are welcome to tweak them to your tastes...[/size][/size][/i][/color]"
Because it's characters from Xena? You don't have to download it. [/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][size=2]
[/size]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][size=2][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][b][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]I want Xena's Armor and Chakram!?[/color][/color][/b][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][size=2][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/size][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][color=#ffffff]You're not going to be able to craft her specific items. You can take her specific Chakram from her through a trade, but if you really want your own Chakram, then you need to download the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]Warrior Within Weapons Pack[/url] and if you want Xena's Armor, then you need to download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26129/?]Xena - warrior princess for CBBE V3[/url]. If you want Callisto's Armor, then you need to download the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13667/?]Nightmare Armor by Hentai[/url]. [/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][size=2][size=2]
[color=#93c47d][size=2][color=#93c47d][size=3][size=1][size=3]Recommended:
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=2]To maximize your experience with these followers[i].[/i][/size][/color][/size][/size][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8][i][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][color=#93c47d][u][color=#93c47d][u]
[/u][/color][/u][/color][/color][/u][/color][/color][/i][/color][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/size]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?]Guild Starter[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950]UFO[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]EFF[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31581]Simple Multiple Followers[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52909/?]Simple Divorce[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home is Your Home[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370]Spouses to Custom Homes
[/url]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Caliente's Vanilla Outfits [/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors [/url](and the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58708/?]CBBE option[/url])
[size=2]
[/size][size=3]Log:[/size]
[size=3]1.0.1[/size]
Height was adjusted so she was taller
Equipped with a Wrathman Greatsword
[b]1.0.2[/b]
Added in a Chakram from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]Warrior Within Weapons[/url] and equipped it as her default Weapon. It uses a custom name called "Xena's Chakram" and it does more damage then the one from that pack.
Changed her hairstyle to a fringe style from the Apachii SkyHair Female Pack.
Modified her perks and added in the Firebreath Shout.
Added in Callisto.
Added in Gabrielle.
Changed Xena's voice to FemaleCommander.
Tweaked Gabrielle's and Callisto's Face further.
Gave Callisto [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13667/?]Nightmare Armor by Hentai[/url].
Fixed Callisto's Pink Forehead created by Makeup.
[color=#c27ba0]I removed Argo for now, but I will be adding him in a later update! I have plans to make him a really unique horse. [/color]
author: BrownPastel

files.name: 1-0-2 Xena and Callisto will now Auto Level
